General.Name: Enalyzer A/S
General.Description: Enalyzer A/S provides solutions for the measurement and analysis of employee satisfaction, and customer and citizen views on various topics worldwide. The company offers Enalyzer, a platform for completion of outsourced and anchoring surveys. It also provides consulting, training, and support services. Enalyzer A/S was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
